text: No Mercy (2000) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on October 22, 2000 at the Pepsi Arena in Albany, New York. It was the third No Mercy event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 THe Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) last eliminated Right to Censor (The Goodfather and Bull Buchanan) Dudley Boyz Invitational Tables Match 12:18 2 Chris Jericho defeated X-Pac Steel cage match 10:04 3 Right to Censor (Val Venis and Steven Richards) defeated Chyna and Mr. Ass Tag team match 7:10 4 Stone Cold Steve Austin fought Rikishi to a no contest No Holds Barred Match 9:21 5 William Regal (c) defeated Naked Mideon Singles match for the WWF European Championship 6:10 6 Los Conquistadores (Edge and Christian in masks) defeated The Hardy Boyz (Matt and Jeff Harsy) (c) Tag team match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 10:52 7 Triple H defeated Chris Benoit Singles match 18:43 8 Kurt Angle (with Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley) defeated The Rock (c) No Disqualification match for the WWF Championship 21:01 (c) â€“is the champion(s) going into the match ;Gauntlet match Elimination Team Eliminated by Times 1 Lo Down (Chaz and D'Lo Brown) Too Cool (Scotty Too Hotty and Grand Master Sexay) 03:54 2 Too Cool Tazz and Raven 07:10 3 Tazz and Raven Dudley Boyz 09:18 4 Right to Censor (The Goodfather and Bull Buchanan) Dudley Boyz 12:18 Winner: The Dudley Boyz ==References== ==Other websites== *Official No Mercy 2000 website Category:2000 in professional wrestling Category:Albany, New York Category:WWE No Mercy Category:2000s in New York (state) Category:2000 in the United States Category:October events
